Description of incident: Ticket vending machines associated with Long Island Rail Road were discovered to have been compromised.  Customers who used their debit and credit cards at the machines may have had their information recorded and used to create fraudulent payment cards.  Tiny cameras were placed on the machines and hidden in thin black strips.  A total of seven machines in Bayside, Garden City, Great Neck, Greenvale, and Merillon Avenue were compromised.
